title: Motion of electron in uniform electric field

content.question: If the only force acting on an electron is due to a uniform electric field, the electron moves with constant

choices.label: acceleration in a direction opposite to that of the field
acceleration in the direction of the field
acceleration in a direction perpendicular to that of the field
speed in a direction opposite to that of the field
speed in the direction of the field

content.answer: acceleration in a direction opposite to that of the field

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
